Scrape NFL weekly outcomes by week

Source: R/scrape_nfl_weekly_standings.R
scrape_nfl_weekly_standings.Rd

Scrape NFL weekly outcomes by week

scrape_nfl_weekly_standings(season = 2020, tidy = FALSE)

Arguments

season

character or numeric - greater than 1990
tidy

logical - either TRUE to stack data by game/week or FALSE to return table as is

Value

tibble

Examples


# Here we run w/ tidy = FALSE to get the exact table from PFR
scrape_nfl_weekly_standings(season = 2020, tidy = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 256 x 16
#>    game_num season  week day   date  time  winner_tie home_team loser_tie
#>       <int>  <int> <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>      <chr>     <chr>    
#>  1        1   2020     1 Thu   Sept… 8:20… Kansas Ci… ""        Houston …
#>  2        2   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Seattle S… "@"       Atlanta …
#>  3        3   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Washingto… ""        Philadel…
#>  4        4   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Buffalo B… ""        New York…
#>  5        5   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… New Engla… ""        Miami Do…
#>  6        6   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Baltimore… ""        Clevelan…
#>  7        7   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Las Vegas… "@"       Carolina…
#>  8        8   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Jacksonvi… ""        Indianap…
#>  9        9   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Green Bay… "@"       Minnesot…
#> 10       10   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Chicago B… "@"       Detroit …
#> # … with 246 more rows, and 7 more variables: pts_winner <dbl>,
#> #   pts_loser <dbl>, yds_winner <dbl>, turnovers_winner <dbl>, yds_loser <dbl>,
#> #   turnovers_loser <dbl>, winner <dbl>

# Here we scrape the outcome and stack the games on top of eachother
scrape_nfl_weekly_standings(season = 2020, tidy = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 512 x 12
#>    game_num season  week day   date  time  team  home_team points yards
#>       <int>  <int> <dbl> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>     <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1        1   2020     1 Thu   Sept… 8:20… Kans…         1     34   369
#>  2        1   2020     1 Thu   Sept… 8:20… Hous…         0     20   360
#>  3        2   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Seat…         0     38   383
#>  4        2   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Atla…         1     25   506
#>  5        3   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Wash…         1     27   258
#>  6        3   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Phil…         0     17   327
#>  7        4   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Buff…         1     27   410
#>  8        4   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… New …         0     17   254
#>  9        5   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… New …         1     21   372
#> 10        5   2020     1 Sun   Sept… 1:00… Miam…         0     11   278
#> # … with 502 more rows, and 2 more variables: turnovers <dbl>, winner <dbl>
